title: Designers favourites.
content:
' [Fifty designers’ current favourite typefaces.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108091026/http:/www.createreject.com/unicef/more.php)', curated by [James West](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108091026/http:/www.createreject.com/about.php).

_(Including the 'likes' of some of the most renowned and best contemporary and 'all-star' designers. And — '100% of the cover price goes to UNICEF’s Myanmar (Burma) Cyclone Children’s Appeal in the wake of Cyclone Nargis that hit Myanmar on 2nd May 2008.' Good one. Respect. Bought.)_
author: Dav
